Word of the Day

Hello!

(foo)

— n.

First posted on: 02.02.2010

A pun is the lowest form of humor,
unless you thought of it yourself.
Doug Larson
Of puns it has been said that those who most
dislike them are those who are least able to utter them.
Edgar Allan Poe
Hanging is too good for a man who makes puns;
He should be drawn and quoted.
Fred Allen
Puns are the droppings of soaring wits.
Victor Hugo
